content: simple fingerless mittens i m so excited to introduce ginnel a super chunky and cosy pair of fingerless mittens for this pattern i wanted to create the ultimate gift knitting project simple fast but with plenty of room to really adapt them to fit the recipient think of them as your blank canvas to paint however you like in the images i have shown just a few ways to get creative but i can t wait to see what you come up with check out the last page to see all the ways to keep in touch and share your ginnel s happy knitting x yarn cascasdes ecological wool 100% wool 477 yds 250g 1 skein in colour vanilla -
